short_summary: Purchase of label printers for use by Employment and Social Development Canada
description: a requirement for the supply and delivery of label printers on an \
full_summary:
Government Tender Announcement for Label Printers
=====================================================

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number**: WS3979631723-Doc3979746114
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3979631723
* **Publication Date**: April 27, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: May 2, 2023, 2:00 PM

### Tender Status

This RFSO has been cancelled.

### Category and Procurement Method

* **Category**: Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method**: Open Bidding

### Tender Description

The Department of Employment and Social Development Canada is issuing a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for the supply and delivery of label printers. The purpose of this RFSO is to establish a Standing Offer for the delivery of label printers to multiple destinations across Canada over a one-year period, with an option to extend for three additional one-year periods. The initial requirement is for the supply and delivery of approximately 350 label making printers.

### Requirements

* The label printers are required to meet specific technical specifications.
* The deliveries are to be made to various destinations across Canada.
* The bidder must be willing to provide a precise timeline for delivery.
* The bidder must demonstrate the ability to provide timely technical support and maintenance.

### Notice Details

* **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer
* **Trade Agreements**: The following trade agreements apply:
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* **Notice URL**: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16121652?extsite=MTYxMjE2NTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/161216
